Name: Avarice
About the game: Face down unfathomable evil in a unique roguelike experience with everything you can see at your disposal. If it exists in the world, you can throw it! Plates? Toss-able and deadly. Tables? Great for blocking a few extra hits and maybe a viable weapon! Barrels? Crates? Iron Maidens? All these items and more are strewn about this demonic dungeon. You will never be without a weapon so what's victory without a bit of greed, right? Fight Till the End and Conquer the Demon King! Will you survive the dungeon? Or will you succumb to your own Avarice ? Features Chuck, hurl, and toss everything you can get your hands on! Battle a variety of deadly enemies and watch them explode! Experience procedurally generated levels (No two play-throughs will be the same!) Explore an expansive dungeon with multiple levels. (at your own risk!) Collect armor and weapons to defend yourself! Powerful Weapons Choose between three powerful weapons! Pierce Through Your Enemies With the Spear! Destroy multiple enemies with a strong throw of your trusty weapon. Wind up and let it fly, but make sure it's fully charged, or else it might be hard to get it back. Smash Enemies to Bits With the Devastating Warhammer. Spin and toss this devastating weapon to deal massive damage to those around you. While destroying enemies with a spinning attack, be warned, you might just leave yourself open to distant attacks. Slice Enemies to Pieces With Quick Hits From the Dagger. Angle your attacks carefully and ricochet these weapons to hit hard to reach foes. Unload a volley in quick succession, each attack having the potential to hit multiple enemies with a single toss.
